name: Dirt Bike Road Fight Racing
description:
One of the Most addictive Racing game on AppStore!

This skill-based 3D Action Racing Game is all about your supreme control over the gaming abilities, very good judgement, tactful Kicking ,Punching or using weapons.This game is not for the faint hearted – only the most committed and highly-skilled players will be deemed worthy enough to join the Race.
Are you made for this?
We will see you in the game.

Game Features
- Incredible physics engine that provides realistic-looking vehicle - Unique ,Easy and smooth gameplay
- Exciting
- Different terrains/location
- EASY controls with only 2 buttons
- CRAZY jumps and loops
- Beautiful off-road terrains
- Many Levels With Stunning 3 Dimensional Graphics
- Intelligent Missions To Give You A Tough Competition.
- Crazy Addictive Experience.
- Environments That Keeps Changing
- Real Animations And Physics
